body.name: Perlegear Full Motion TV Wall Mount for Most 37-85 inch TVs up to 132 lbs, TV Mount with Dual Articulating Arms, Tool-Free Tilt, Swivel & Extension, Max VESA 600x400mm, 12″/16″ Wood Studs, PGLF4
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Monday, February 19 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35. Order within 16 hrs 45 mins
features: Hang Your TV Securely: Made from heavy-duty steel, this 85 inch tv wall mount from Perlegear is engineered to support up to 132 lbs. Durable articulating arms ensure incredible stability, while the anti-drop end caps and security locks secure your TV in place.

Wide Compatibility: The full motion 75 inch TV wall mount works with most 37″-85″ TVs with VESA patterns 200x100 to 600x400mm. Please verify the size, weight, and VESA pattern of your TV before purchase.

Enjoy Optimum Viewing: With tool-free tilt, the TV wall mount 65 inch tv bracket allows you to tilt the TV 15° forward and 5° backward to reduce glare. You can also swivel your TV 45° left or right to watch more comfortably from any seat in the room.

Smoothly Extend & Retract: The large articulating TV mount 65 inch extends your TV out 16.9″ from the wall for a more immersive viewing experience. When you’re not watching, simply retract the adjustable TV wall mount back to 2.72″ for a clean and streamlined look.

Easy to Install: The 85 inch TV wall Mount includes a handy drilling template, detailed instructions, and standard mounting hardware for easy installation on 12″/16″ wood studs, concrete, or block walls. The +/-3° leveling adjustment allows you to fine-tune your TV’s position after mounting.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Perlegear PGLF4 Full Motion TV Wall Mount Elevate your entertainment experience with the Perlegear full motion TV wall mount. Featuring +/-45° swivel and +5°/-15° tilt, you can enjoy an optimum viewing angle from any seat. Extend the arms out 16.9″ for closer viewing or retract back to 2.72″ for a clean, streamlined look.
Previous page Next page 1 Check TV Specifications 2 TV Sizes and Weight 3 TV VESA Patterns 4 Wall Types

The full motion TV bracket is crafted from high-quality steel to ensure long-lasting performance. Anti-drop end caps and security locks secure your TV in place for peace of mind. Create a sleek and modern entertainment setup in your living space with this mount from Perlegear.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 20, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Inexpensive High Quality Mount
reviews.reviewText: I mounted my 90ish pound 85" Samsung with this. Relatively easy, in fact did it solo (but probably should have had a partner, lol). Feels really solid, especially if you do it correctly by screwing it right into the studs. Fully confident it will stand the test of time. Also, nice if you didn't happen to get it perfect level into the wall because there's some wiggle room with the tv rotation.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 16, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Bracket works like it should
reviews.reviewText: Bracket is simple to install and holds weight of large tv as weight stated in ad. Works as stated in ad. Verified purchase. Would purchase again.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 30, 2023
reviews.reviewText: holds a lot of weight.... 180lbs man hung from it... no problems

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 28, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars On 85 inch samsung , quality, sturdy
reviews.reviewText: It's scary to put Is a bracket like this on a huge tv. But this one turns out to be a real winner very sturdy. Priced right.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 20, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Nice quality for a low price.
reviews.reviewText: I purchased two of these for my media room. Very good quality and swivel quite well. Silent and sturdy.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 27, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Holding my 75" 80 lb TV with no problem
reviews.reviewText: Easy to install despite my "approximate" 24" spacing on studs - new construction just isn't what it used to be! Holding tight a week after install with no sag or issues of any kind. Very easy to mount the TV. Make sure you have the tilt bolts tightened before you mount the TV though! Was not very easy to do it afterward. But we got it done.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 9, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very sturdy tv mount
reviews.reviewText: Does what it is supposed to do and was easy to install as it has a "hanger" type thing to mount to the back of the TV and hang on the wall mount - i.e., you don't have to hold up the TV to the wall mount while screwing it on. Thus made it much easier and safer to get the job done.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 7, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Easy to install plenty hardware screws bolts works great
